name: Giant Trucks Driving Simulator
description:
Enter a giant truck and start exploring a realistic city environment! Complete missions, unlock new trucks, show your driving skills!

FEATURES:
▶ REALISTIC CITY ENVIRONMENT: Featuring a big roundabout!
▶ DYNAMIC TRAFFIC SYSTEM: Test your driving skills to the limits!
▶ HUGE NUMBER OF MISSIONS: Can you complete all of them?
▶ AMAZING TRUCKS TO CHOOSE FROM: Which one is your favorite?
▶ AUTHENTIC DRIVING MODEL: Feel like a pro driver!

The game features a realistic and challenging environment with Moving Traffic to keep you on your toes! Drive your huge Freight Truck safely and quickly.

Interesting and varied levels will test your judgment, control and precision in controlling the massive, heavy truck with some demanding maneuvers and really tight turns.

Deliver the cargo in time and try not to cause any traffic pile-ups! Can you drive safely with speed through really tricky routes, judging the gaps in traffic and deliver your cargo before you run out of time?

Driving has never been so much fun!
